channel.title: Something in pvp makes my client crash
channel.description:
somtimes when my players attack eachother they click and they everyone in that area clients crash
what would this be? and how would i fix
i dont know what the error is my users never told me but when i look on my server CMD i see them all loguot at once when there in pvp... how would i do this

item.title: Something in pvp makes my client crash
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

no… the client crashes not the sever all it says for them is

micy1 - has disconencted
DID NOT SAVE FOR FILE micy1
hermal - has disconnected
DID NOT SAVE FOR FILE hermal

and it only dosent save when there client crashes…

so yeah… its osmthing with pvp cuz it dosent happen anywhere elts[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2009, 03:30:11 am[/size][hr]i dont know hwat keep crashing them in pvp

Read full topic
item.source: Something in pvp makes my client crash
